    • Method Detail

      • notifications

        @Deprecated
public NotificationMessageListResponse notifications(Long accountId,
                                                       String appKey,
                                                       List<Enums.EVENTS> eventTypes,
                                                       List<Long> contentIds,
                                                       List<String> contentTypes,
                                                       List<Long> parentIds,
                                                       List<String> parentTypes,
                                                       String keyword,
                                                       Boolean returnReadMessages,
                                                       Boolean markAsRead,
                                                       Long fromDate,
                                                       Location location,
                                                       Integer start,
                                                       Integer limit)
                                              throws SirqulException
        Deprecated. 
        Get a list of notifications for a user. If the "markAsRead" parameter is set to true, the returned notifications will be marked as "read" after the response has been sent. By default, read messages will not be returned, so to see read messages, set "returnReadMessages" to true.

        Target API Endpoint: /notifications
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        eventTypes - list of Enums.EVENTS. Filters search results to only include these events. Pass in null return all event types.
        contentIds - list of content ids to search notifications on
        contentTypes - list of content types to search notifications on
        parentIds - list of parent ids to search notifications on
        parentTypes - list of parent types to search notifications on
        keyword - search notifications via keyword
        returnReadMessages - if set to true, will return notifications that have been marked as read
        markAsRead - if set to true, the returned notifications will be marked as "read" after the response has been sent
        fromDate - filter notifications from this date
        location - the location used to update the user's current location
        start - the start of the pagination
        limit - the limit of the pagination
        Returns:
        a NotificationMessageListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • registerNotificationToken

        public SirqulResponse registerNotificationToken(Long accountId,
                                       String token,
                                       Enums.PushType pushType,
                                       String appKey,
                                       Boolean active,
                                       Location location)
                                         throws SirqulException
        Register a token to send application dependent notifications like Google Cloud Messaging, or Apple Push Notifications.

        Target API Endpoint: /notification/token
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        token - A token that is generated by the device to sign requests for the notification service providers
        pushType - The type of push notification. Possible values include: APNS, GCM
        appKey - The application key
        active - Sets whether the token is active or not (non-active tokens are not used)
        location - android.location.Location used to update the user's current location
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchNotifications

        public NotificationMessageListResponse searchNotifications(Long accountId,
                                                  String appKey,
                                                  List<Enums.EVENTS> eventTypes,
                                                  List<Long> contentIds,
                                                  List<String> contentTypes,
                                                  List<Long> parentIds,
                                                  List<String> parentTypes,
                                                  String keyword,
                                                  Boolean returnReadMessages,
                                                  Boolean markAsRead,
                                                  Long fromDate,
                                                  Location location,
                                                  Integer start,
                                                  Integer limit)
                                                    throws SirqulException
        Get a list of notifications for a user. If the "markAsRead" parameter is set to true, the returned notifications will be marked as "read" after the response has been sent. By default, read messages will not be returned, so to see read messages, set "returnReadMessages" to true.

        Ex. get a list of chat messages:

        eventType = "CUSTOM"
        returnReadMessages = (for android) 1, (for ios) 0,
        fromDate = (required for android, not required for ios) date since the last chat retrieval

        Target API Endpoint: /notification/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        appKey - the application key to filter messages by application
        eventTypes - the event types
        contentIds - comma separated list of content ids to search notifications on
        contentTypes - comma separated list of content types to search notifications on
        parentIds - comma separated list of parent ids to search notifications on
        parentTypes - comma separated list of parent types to search notifications on
        keyword - search notifications via keyword
        returnReadMessages - if set to true, will return notifications that have been marked as read
        markAsRead - if set to true, the returned notifications will be marked as "read" after the response has been sent
        fromDate - filter notifications from this date
        location - the location
        start - start of the pagination
        limit - limit of the pagination
        Returns:
        NotificationMessageListResponse on an valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRecipients

        public SearchResponse<NotificationRecipientResponse> searchRecipients(Long accountId,
                                                             String appKey,
                                                             Enums.Conduits conduit,
                                                             String keyword,
                                                             Enums.AccountAppSettingsApiMap sortField,
                                                             Boolean descending,
                                                             Integer start,
                                                             Integer limit)
                                                               throws SirqulException
        Search for application users to send notifications.

        Target API Endpoint: /notification/recipient/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        appKey - filters results by application. If this is empty, will return all recipients for all applications that the user has access to.
        conduit - the type of notification to send {EMAIL, SMS, MOBILE_NOTIFICATION}
        keyword - search by keyword on user's display name and email
        sortField - The field to sort by. Possible values include: {ACCOUNT_DISPLAY, CREATED, UPDATED, ACTIVE, DELETED, LAST_LOGGED_IN, CONTACT_EMAIL, RETAILER_LOCATION_NAME, RETAILER_NAME, APPLICATION_NAME}
        descending - Determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - the start of the pagination
        limit - the limit of the pagination (hard limit of 1000)
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<NotificationRecipientResponse> on an valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • sendBatchNotifications

        public SirqulResponse sendBatchNotifications(Long accountId,
                                    String appKey,
                                    Enums.Conduits conduit,
                                    String customMessage,
                                    Long contentId,
                                    String contentName,
                                    String contentType,
                                    Long parentId,
                                    String parentType)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Send notifications to all users of an application. Only someone with permissions to the application can do this.

        Target API Endpoint: /notification/batch
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the application owner/manager
        appKey - The application key for updating an existing application
        conduit - The type of notification to send {EMAIL, SMS, MOBILE_NOTIFICATION}
        customMessage - Message string that will be displayed in on the notification
        contentId - Default notification pay-load field (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        contentName - Default notification pay-load field (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        contentType - Default notification pay-load field (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        parentId - Default notification pay-load field (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        parentType - Default notification pay-load field (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • sendNotification

        public SirqulResponse sendNotification(Long accountId,
                              List<Long> receiverAccountIds,
                              Boolean includeFriendGroup,
                              String appKey,
                              Enums.Conduits conduit,
                              Long contentId,
                              String contentName,
                              String contentType,
                              Long parentId,
                              String parentType,
                              String customMessage,
                              Boolean friendOnlyAPNS,
                              Location location)
                                throws SirqulException
        Send your own custom notification to a user. NOTE: the EventType of these notifications will be "CUSTOM". Notifications sent to yourself will currently be ignored.

        Payload Ex. for Playfield chat messages: User John (1) sends the message "Hello!" to user Josh (2)
        receiverAccountIds = 2
        contentId = 1
        contentName = message from the user (i.e. "Hello!")
        contentType = "CHAT"
        customMessage = message in the notification (i.e. "John says: Hello!")

        Target API Endpoint: /notification/custom
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        receiverAccountIds - comma separated list of account IDs that will receive the notification
        includeFriendGroup - determines whether to send to all of the user's friends, this flag must be true or receiverAccountIds must not be empty
        appKey - the application key.
        conduit - the type of notification to send {EMAIL, SMS, MOBILE_NOTIFICATION}
        contentId - notification pay-load (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        contentName - notification pay-load (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        contentType - notification pay-load (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        parentId - notification pay-load (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        parentType - notification pay-load (usage is dependent on the app and the type of event)
        customMessage - message string that will be displayed in on the notification
        friendOnlyAPNS - only sends APNS to people who are friends of the user (still saves the notification message for feed polling)
        location - the location
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
